Class ClientScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.ClientScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ClientScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This client controller class implements all actions done on the client screen

      • fetchOrder

        public int fetchOrder(javafx.scene.control.TableView table)
        This method gets the invoice numbers from the correct tables (Unpaid/Paid) by using an if-else statement.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • paymentScreenRunning

        public void paymentScreenRunning(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method makes it so an error message occurs when you attempt to pay for a booking that is already paid. It also ensures that if the booking needs to be paid, it will load the payment scree when the button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - when pressed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Exception on sql errors.
